testcase.name: TC_3701 Administrator should be able to view balance changes made offline
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "AdminUrl".....................................passed Then Admin enters an "email", a "password" and then clicks sign in link on admin page to login.passed Then Admin clicks Wallet Manage link........................................passed Then Admin clicks Offline Recharge link.....................................passed Then Admin verifies that Offline Recharge List is displayed on the Offline Recharge Page.passed And Closes the page.........................................................passed
